name: border
description: Puts a border on the alert. Accepts top | right | bottom | left.

name: close-label
description: Text used for aria-label on dismissible alerts. Can also be customizing globally in Internationalization.

name: color
description: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). You can find list of built in classes on the colors page.

name: colored-border
description: Applies the defined color to the alert's border.

name: dark
description: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for dark themes.

name: dense
description: Hides the alert icon and decreases component's height.

name: dismissible
description: Adds a close icon that can hide the alert.

name: elevation
description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the elevation page.

name: height
description: Sets the height for the component.

name: icon
description: Designates a specific icon.

name: light
description: Applies the light theme variant to the component.

name: max-height
description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

name: max-width
description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

name: min-height
description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

name: min-width
description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

name: mode
description: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group). You can find more information on the Vue documentation for transition modes.

name: origin
description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation for transition origin.

name: outlined
description: Makes the background transparent and applies a thin border.

name: prominent
description: Displays a larger vertically centered icon to draw more attention.

name: tag
description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.

name: text
description: Applies the defined color to text and a low opacity background of the same.

name: tile
description: Removes the component's border-radius.

name: transition
description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the built in transitions or one your own.

name: type
description: Specify a success, info, warning or error alert. Uses the contextual color and has a pre-defined icon.

name: value
description: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.

name: width
description: Sets the width for the component.
